game.title: The Lost Amulet Quest
game.objective: Find the Lost Amulet of Kings for the Merchant's Reward
game.description: The Amulet of Kings' Search Mission: Uncover its whereabouts, return it to the merchant, and gain his gratitude.
game.reward: 500 gold pieces and a special commendation from the merchant.

task.objective: Examine Merchant's Warehouse for clues on the amulet's location.
task.description: Beware: The warehouse in the city's district has a loading dock at the back. Search carefully for any relevant information.

task.objective: Investigate the rumors about the amulet in the old ruins.
task.description: Cautious exploration: The ruins are said to be haunted, so tread carefully.

task.objective: Discover and enter the secret entrance to the underground chamber.
task.description: The amulet's location is concealed deep within. Hunt for it.

task.objective: Battle the guardian protecting the amulet.
task.description: A formidable challenge awaits: defeat the creature to claim your prize.
